description: ThinkCraft AI思维助手项目配置

scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:css & npm run dev
scripts.lint: eslint frontend/js/modules/chat frontend/js/modules/report frontend/js/modules/project-manager.js frontend/js/core/storage-manager.js backend/src/features/projects --ext .js --max-warnings 9999
scripts.lint:fix: eslint frontend/js/modules/chat frontend/js/modules/report frontend/js/modules/project-manager.js frontend/js/core/storage-manager.js backend/src/features/projects --ext .js --fix --max-warnings 9999
scripts.cleanup:verify: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect('mongodb://localhost:27017/thinkcraft').then(async () => { const db = mongoose.connection.db; const collections = ['projects', 'chats', 'business_plans', 'analysis_reports', 'users']; for (const col of collections) { const count = await db.collection(col).countDocuments(); console.log(col + ': ' + count); } process.exit(0); });"
